sentence: Trump's son, Donald Trump Jr., previously called her the Alabama Liz Cheney.? Brooks has been a fierce opponent of the Chamber's mass immigration agenda, and U.S. free trade with China initiatives.
author: John Binder
title: Mo Brooks Scores Fundraiser with Trump as Primary Opponent Fumbles Mar-a-Lago Meeting

sentence: Repeated attacks by former President Donald Trump as he tries to oust Rep. Liz Cheney from Congress keep fueling massive fundraising by the Republican lawmaker from Wyoming.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Targeted by Trump, Cheney hauls in nearly $3 million the past three months for her re-election run
